frontMatter.description: Form controls for collecting user information

when_to_use.value: Collecting user information in structured formats
Grouping related fields using fieldsets and legends
Asking questions with multiple choice options

when_to_consider_else.value: A single form field has a sufficiently descriptive label without needing fieldsets
Information gathering requires complex interactive patterns beyond standard form controls

accessibility.value: Announce validation errors and shift focus to unfilled required fields

Remove or hide invalid options rather than disabling them
